issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as extern instead of global, which conflicts with the template and prevents exporting the function for linking.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, declare fix_vec_sub_asm as global (e.g., replace 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm') so it matches the template export and links correctly.
